short_summary: Commercial and office building construction services
description: Supply of labour, materials, tools, equipment, transportation, and supervision for all maintenance and construction services of DND infrastructure
full_summary:
# W6897-230056 Department of National Defence Building Maintenance Services, Southern Alberta
### A Standing Offer Opportunity

**Reference Number**: WS4059803745
**Amendment Number**: 0
**Solicitation Number**: WS4059803745
**Publication Date**: June 19, 2023
**Tender Closing Date**: July 25, 2023 (14:00:00)
**Amendment Date**: June 19, 2023
**Expected Contract Start Date**: July 31, 2023
**Expected Contract End Date**: Ongoing

### Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services is seeking a contractor to provide building maintenance services for the Department of National Defence infrastructure in Southern Alberta. The services include providing all necessary labour, materials, tools, equipment, transportation, and supervision to carry out repairs, maintenance, and construction work on DND-owned residential and commercially owned infrastructure.

### Scope of Work

The scope of work includes, but is not limited to:

* Locksmith services
* Concrete repairs
* Roof repairs
* Exterior building envelope repairs
* Flooring repairs (various types)
* Electrical repairs
* Plumbing and HVAC repairs
* Kitchen canopy cleaning
* Fall arrest system inspections and repairs
* Welding repairs
* Metal door and frame installation/repairs
* General carpentry tasks and services
* Painting services
* Gypsum wall board patching

### Locations

The work sites for this Standing Offer will include CFB Suffield sites, including DND, BATUS, and DRDC occupied buildings. Other locations will include the Village of Ralston, CFB Suffield utility and natural gas field locations, and other DND occupied facilities in Southern Alberta.

### Notice Information

* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services
* Contracting Entity Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5
* End-User Entity: Department of National Defence
* End-User Entity Address: 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2
* Contact Person: Alex Tikhonovitch, tikhonovitch.alex@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
